biotools.summary: Major update to the original Phyre server. The new system is designed around the idea that you have a protein sequence/gene and want to predict its three-dimensional (3D) structure. It uses the alignment of hidden Markov models via HHsearch1 to significantly improve accuracy of alignment and detection rate.

bioschemas.name: Phyre
bioschemas.summary: Major update to the original Phyre server.
